TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MemoryMappedFileRights extends System.Enum

remarks.para: You can specify access rights when you use the method to open an existing memory-mapped file.

summary.para: Specifies access rights to a memory-mapped file that is not associated with a file on disk.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights AccessSystemSecurity = int32(16777216)

summary.para: The right to get or set permissions on a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights ChangePermissions = int32(262144)

summary.para: The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights CopyOnWrite = int32(1)

summary.para: The right to read and write to a file with the restriction that write operations will not be seen by other processes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights Delete = int32(65536)

summary.para: The right to delete a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights Execute = int32(8)

summary.para: The right to run an application file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights FullControl = int32(983055)

summary.para: The right to exert full control over a file, and to modify access control and audit rules. This value represents the right to do anything with a file and is the combination of all rights in this enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights Read = int32(4)

summary.para: The right to open and copy a file as read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights ReadExecute = int32(12)

summary.para: The right to open and copy a folder or file as read-only, and to run application files. This right includes the right and the right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights ReadPermissions = int32(131072)

summary.para: The right to open and copy access and audit rules from a file. This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or extended file system attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights ReadWrite = int32(6)

summary.para: The right to open and copy a file, and the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights ReadWriteExecute = int32(14)

summary.para: The right to open and copy a file, the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file, and the right to run an application file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights TakeOwnership = int32(524288)

summary.para: The right to change the owner of a file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights Write = int32(2)

summary.para: The right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.
